doc.title: Not Another Jewish Movie
doc.plot: This quirky Jewish film features a chorus of eleven Bay Area teenagers, each grappling with ambivalent feelings about their connection to Jewish culture and a sense of uneasiness about participating in mainstream American life. With a healthy mixture of offbeat humor and beautiful images of Bay Area architecture and landscapes, this highly anticipated first offering of the New Jewish Filmmaker Project presents a candid, eccentric vision of what it means to grow up Jewish in the Bay Area.
